name: Every Day Heroes
description:
I bet you never expected to run into a super hero did ya' mall cop?  Round up the frantic citizens and lead them to safety as you avoid The Two super powered pests duking it out.  But beware, everything around you is in danger of being smashed too.

Michael: producer, creative director
Andrew: lead animator
Cody: Lead environment artist, VFX Artist
Nicholas B. Zacovic: Lead prop Artist

Rastal (itch)(twitter): technical director
Shaux: lead gameplay programmer
Austin: programmer

Marcy: lead composer and sound designer
Ben: lead sound designer

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Spacebar
